definitions.title: pers.
definitions.body: (cf. Sab [[חחַרן]] n.pr.loc. vel. trib. Hal:No. 661 DHM:ZMG 1883,15)—

definitions.title: a.
definitions.body: [[חֶחְרוֹן]] Jos 15:3 place in extreme south of Judah, + [[אַדָּ֫רָה]] = [[חֲחַר־אַדָּר]] (q.v.) Nu 34:4.

definitions.title: b.
definitions.body: [[קְרִיּוֹת]] [[חֶחְרוֹן הִיא חָחוֹר]] Jos 15:25 another town of Judah in south.

definitions.title: a.
definitions.body: [[חֶחְרׂן]] son of Reuben Ge 46:9, Ex 6:14, Nu 26:6 = [[חֶחְרוֹן]] 1Ch 5:3.

definitions.title: b.
definitions.body: son of Pereṣ and grandson of Judah Ge 46:12, Nu 26:21 = [[חֶחְרוֹן]] Ru 4:18, Ru 4:19, 1Ch 2:5, 1Ch 2:9, 1Ch 2:18, 1Ch 2:21, 1Ch 2:24, 1Ch 2:24, 1Ch 2:25, 1Ch 4:1.
